channel.title: Restless Town
channel.description: Restless Town is collection of furry short fiction set in the fictional town of Sawtooth, Idaho.
channel.itunes:author: Madison Scott-Clary
channel.itunes:subtitle: Restless Town is a collection of furry short fiction set in the fictional town of Sawtooth, Idaho.
channel.itunes:summary: Restless Town is a collection of furry short fiction set in the fictional town of Sawtooth, Idaho. Exploring the themes of gender, love, queer relationships, and mental health, these stories reflect, through their characters, the struggles of the wider world.

item.title: The Fool
item.description: A student and a motherly badger explore questions of identity through a tarot reading.
item.itunes:author: Madison Scott-Clary
item.itunes:subtitle: A student and a motherly badger explore questions of identity through a tarot reading.
item.itunes:summary: A student and a motherly badger explore questions of identity through a tarot reading.
item.itunes:keywords: fiction, short story, furry, tarot, transgender, gender
